allowProjectManagement.description: Specifies whether this resource support project management as child resources, used as containers for access management, data isolation and cost in AI Foundry.

amlWorkspace.description: The user owned AML account properties.

apiProperties.description: The api properties for special APIs.

associatedProjects.description: Specifies the projects, by project name, that are associated with this resource.

customSubDomainName.description: Optional subdomain name used for token-based authentication.

defaultProject.description: Specifies the project, by project name, that is targeted when data plane endpoints are called without a project parameter.

dynamicThrottlingEnabled.description: The flag to enable dynamic throttling.

encryption.description: The encryption properties for this resource.

locations.description: The multiregion settings of Cognitive Services account.

networkAcls.description: A collection of rules governing the accessibility from specific network locations.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Whether or not public endpoint access is allowed for this account.

storedCompletionsDisabled.description: The flag to disable stored completions.

userOwnedStorage.description: The storage accounts for this resource.

AgentDeploymentProperties.description: Type representing an agent deployment as a management construct.

oneOf.description: Represents a hosted agent deployment where the underlying infrastructure is owned by the platform.

maxReplicas.description: Gets or sets the maximum number of replicas for this hosted deployment.

minReplicas.description: Gets or sets the minimum number of replicas for this hosted deployment.

oneOf.description: Represents a managed agent deployment where the underlying infrastructure is managed by the platform in the deployer's subscription.

agents.description: Returns a flat list of agent:version deployed in this deployment.

deploymentId.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the deployment.

displayName.description: Gets or sets the display name of the deployment.

protocols.description: Gets or sets the supported protocol types and versions exposed by this deployment.

state.description: Gets or sets the current operational state of the deployment (and, intrinsically, of the comprising agents).

tags.description: Tag dictionary. Tags can be added, removed, and updated.

AgentProtocolVersion.description: Type modeling the protocol and version used by an agent/exposed by a deployment.

protocol.description: The protocol used by the agent/exposed by a deployment.

AgentReferenceProperties.description: Type modeling a reference to a version of an agent definition.

agentId.description: Gets the agent's unique identifier within the organization (subscription).

agentName.description: Gets the agent's name (unique within the project/app).

AgenticApplicationProperties.description: Resource type representing an agentic application as a management construct.

agentIdentityBlueprint.description: The EntraId Agentic Blueprint of the application.

agents.description: The list of agent definitions comprising this application, returned as references to the objects under the parent project; use this to obtain a flat list of all agent-version pairs represented by this application.

authorizationPolicy.description: Gets or sets the authorization policy associated with this agentic application instance.

defaultInstanceIdentity.description: The (default) agent instance identity of the application.

displayName.description: The display name of the application.

tags.description: Tag dictionary. Tags can be added, removed, and updated.

trafficRoutingPolicy.description: Gets or sets the traffic routing policy for the application's deployments.

ApiProperties.description: The api properties for special APIs.

aadClientId.description: (Metrics Advisor Only) The Azure AD Client Id (Application Id).

aadTenantId.description: (Metrics Advisor Only) The Azure AD Tenant Id.

eventHubConnectionString.description: (Personalization Only) The flag to enable statistics of Bing Search.

qnaAzureSearchEndpointId.description: (QnAMaker Only) The Azure Search endpoint id of QnAMaker.

qnaAzureSearchEndpointKey.description: (QnAMaker Only) The Azure Search endpoint key of QnAMaker.

qnaRuntimeEndpoint.description: (QnAMaker Only) The runtime endpoint of QnAMaker.

statisticsEnabled.description: (Bing Search Only) The flag to enable statistics of Bing Search.

storageAccountConnectionString.description: (Personalization Only) The storage account connection string.

superUser.description: (Metrics Advisor Only) The super user of Metrics Advisor.

websiteName.description: (Metrics Advisor Only) The website name of Metrics Advisor.

ApplicationAuthorizationPolicy.description: Represents a policy for authorizing applications based on specified authentication and authorization schemes.

oneOf.description: Represents a built-in authorization policy specific to Azure Bot Service/Channels authentication.
Built-in authorization policy scoped to organization/tenant.

ApplicationTrafficRoutingPolicy.description: Type representing an application traffic policy as a property of an agentic application.

protocol.description: Methodology used to route traffic to the application's deployments.

rules.description: Gets or sets the collection of traffic routing rules.

clientId.description: The client ID of the identity.

kind.description: Specifies the kind of Entra identity described by this object.

principalId.description: The principal ID of the identity.

subject.description: The subject of this identity assignment.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID of the identity.

type.description: Enumeration of identity types, from the perspective of management.

customerSubnet.description: Customer subnet info to help set up this capability host.

enablePublicHostingEnvironment.description: Whether public hosting environment is enabled for the capability host

storageConnections.description: List of connection names from those available in the account or project to be used as a storage resource.

tags.description: Tag dictionary. Tags can be added, removed, and updated.

threadStorageConnections.description: List of connection names from those available in the account or project to be used for Thread storage.

vectorStoreConnections.description: List of connection names from those available in the account or project to be used for vector database (e.g. CosmosDB).

CommitmentPlanAccountAssociationProperti.description: The commitment plan account association properties.

accountId.description: The Azure resource id of the account.

CommitmentPlanProperties.description: Properties of Cognitive Services account commitment plan.

ConnectionAccountKey.description: Account key object for connection credential.

ConnectionApiKey.description: Api key object for connection credential.

ConnectionOAuth2.description:
ClientId and ClientSecret are required. Other properties are optional
depending on each OAuth2 provider's implementation.

clientId.description: Client id in the format of UUID

refreshToken.description:
Required by GoogleBigQuery, GoogleAdWords, Hubspot, QuickBooks, Square, Xero, Zoho
where user needs to get RefreshToken offline

tenantId.description: Required by QuickBooks and Xero connection categories

username.description:
Concur, ServiceNow auth server AccessToken grant type is 'Password'
which requires UsernamePassword

oneOf.description: This connection type covers the AAD auth for any applicable Azure service
This connection type covers the account key connection for Azure storage

credentials.description: Account key object for connection credential.

oneOf.description:
This connection type covers the generic ApiKey auth connection categories, for examples:
AzureOpenAI:
    Category:= AzureOpenAI
    AuthType:= ApiKey (as type discriminator)
    Credentials:= {ApiKey} as .ApiKey
    Target:= {ApiBase}
            
CognitiveService:
    Category:= CognitiveService
    AuthType:= ApiKey (as type discriminator)
    Credentials:= {SubscriptionKey} as ApiKey
    Target:= ServiceRegion={serviceRegion}
            
CognitiveSearch:
    Category:= CognitiveSearch
    AuthType:= ApiKey (as type discriminator)
    Credentials:= {Key} as ApiKey
    Target:= {Endpoint}
            
Use Metadata property bag for ApiType, ApiVersion, Kind and other metadata fields

credentials.description: Api key object for connection credential.

oneOf.description:
Category:= CustomKeys
AuthType:= CustomKeys (as type discriminator)
Credentials:= {CustomKeys} as CustomKeys
Target:= {any value}
Use Metadata property bag for ApiVersion and other metadata fields

credentials.description:
ClientId and ClientSecret are required. Other properties are optional
depending on each OAuth2 provider's implementation.

error.description: Provides the error message if the connection fails

metadata.description: Store user metadata for this connection

peRequirement.description: Specifies how private endpoints are used with this connection: 'Required', 'NotRequired', or 'NotApplicable'.

peStatus.description: Specifies the status of private endpoints for this connection: 'Inactive', 'Active', or 'NotApplicable'.

target.description: The connection URL to be used.

securityToken.description: Optional, required by connections like SalesForce for extra security in addition to UsernamePassword

CustomBlocklistConfig.description: Gets or sets the source to which filter applies.

source.description: Content source to apply the Content Filters.

CustomTopicConfig.description: Gets or sets the source to which filter applies.

source.description: Content source to apply the Content Filters.

DefenderForAISettingProperties.description: The Defender for AI resource properties.

state.description: Defender for AI state on the AI resource.

priority.description: The priority of this capacity setting.

DeploymentModel.description: Properties of Cognitive Services account deployment model.

name.description: Deployment model name.

source.description: Optional. Deployment model source ARM resource ID.

sourceAccount.description: Optional. Source of the model, another Microsoft.CognitiveServices accounts ARM resource ID.

version.description: Optional. Deployment model version. If version is not specified, a default version will be assigned. The default version is different for different models and might change when there is new version available for a model. Default version for a model could be found from list models API.

DeploymentProperties.description: Properties of Cognitive Services account deployment.

deploymentState.description: The state of the deployment. Controls whether the deployment is accepting inference requests. Use 'Running' for active deployments that process requests, or 'Paused' to temporarily stop inference while preserving the deployment configuration.

model.description: Properties of Cognitive Services account deployment model.

scaleSettings.description: Properties of Cognitive Services account deployment model. (Deprecated, please use Deployment.sku instead.)

serviceTier.description: The service tier for the deployment. Determines the pricing and performance level for request processing. Use 'Default' for standard pricing or 'Priority' for higher-priority processing with premium pricing. Note: Pause operations are only supported on Standard, DataZoneStandard, and GlobalStandard SKUs.

spilloverDeploymentName.description: Specifies the deployment name that should serve requests when the request would have otherwise been throttled due to reaching current deployment throughput limit.

DeploymentScaleSettings.description: Properties of Cognitive Services account deployment model. (Deprecated, please use Deployment.sku instead.)

keySource.description: Enumerates the possible value of keySource for Encryption
Enumerates the possible value of keySource for Encryption

userAssignedIdentities.description: The list of user assigned identities associated with the resource. The user identity dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}

IpRule.description: A rule governing the accessibility from a specific ip address or ip range.

value.description: An IPv4 address range in CIDR notation, such as '124.56.78.91' (simple IP address) or '124.56.78.0/24' (all addresses that start with 124.56.78).

keyName.description: Name of the Key from KeyVault

keyVersion.description: Version of the Key from KeyVault

ManagedNetworkProvisionStatus.description: Status of the Provisioning for the managed network of a cognitive services account.

status.description: Status for the managed network of a cognitive services account.

firewallSku.description: Firewall Sku used for FQDN Rules

isolationMode.description: Isolation mode for the managed network of a cognitive services account.

managedNetworkKind.description: The Kind of the managed network. Users can switch from V1 to V2 for granular access controls, but cannot switch back to V1 once V2 is enabled.

status.description: Status of the Provisioning for the managed network of a cognitive services account.

ManagedNetworkSettingsProperties.description: The properties of the managed network settings of a cognitive services account.

managedNetwork.description: Managed Network settings for a cognitive services account.

MultiRegionSettings.description: The multiregion settings Cognitive Services account.

NetworkInjection.description: Specifies in AI Foundry where virtual network injection occurs to secure scenarios like Agents entirely within the user's private network, eliminating public internet exposure while maintaining control over network configurations and resources.

scenario.description: Specifies what features in AI Foundry network injection applies to. Currently only supports 'agent' for agent scenarios. 'none' means no network injection.

subnetArmId.description: Specify the subnet for which your Agent Client is injected into.

useMicrosoftManagedNetwork.description: Boolean to enable Microsoft Managed Network for subnet delegation

NetworkRuleSet.description: A set of rules governing the network accessibility.

defaultAction.description: The default action when no rule from ipRules and from virtualNetworkRules match. This is only used after the bypass property has been evaluated.

ipRules.description: The list of IP address rules.

virtualNetworkRules.description: The list of virtual network rules.

OutboundRule.description: Outbound Rule for the managed network of a cognitive services account.

oneOf.description: FQDN Outbound Rule for the managed network of a cognitive services account.

category.description: Category of a managed network Outbound Rule of a cognitive services account.

status.description: Type of a managed network Outbound Rule of a cognitive services account.

groupIds.description: The private link resource group ids.

privateEndpoint.description: The resource of private end point.

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: A collection of information about the state of the connection between service consumer and provider.

PrivateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: A collection of information about the state of the connection between service consumer and provider.

actionsRequired.description: A message indicating if changes on the service provider require any updates on the consumer.

description.description: The reason for approval/rejection of the connection.

status.description: Indicates whether the connection has been Approved/Rejected/Removed by the owner of the service.

storageConnections.description: List of connection names from those available in the account or project to be used as a storage resource.

threadStorageConnections.description: List of connection names from those available in the account or project to be used for Thread storage.

vectorStoreConnections.description: List of connection names from those available in the account or project to be used for vector database (e.g. CosmosDB).

description.description: The description of the Cognitive Services Project.

displayName.description: The display name of the Cognitive Services Project.

tierUpgradePolicy.description: Gets the tier upgrade policy for the subscription.

isRegex.description: If the pattern is a regex pattern.

keyVaultUri.description: The Key Vault URI that contains the api key for safety provider urls.

managedIdentity.description: The managed identity to access the Key Vault.

providerId.description: The unique identifier of the safety provider.

secretName.description: The name of the secret in Key Vault that contains the api key to access the webhook.

url.description: Webhook URL for the safety provider.

identityClientId.description: The identity client Id to access the storage.

action.description: The action types to apply to the content filters

name.description: Name of ContentFilter.

severityThreshold.description: Level at which content is filtered.

source.description: Content source to apply the Content Filters.

customTopics.description: The list of custom rai topics.

mode.description: Rai policy mode. The enum value mapping is as below: Default = 0, Deferred=1, Blocking=2, Asynchronous_filter =3. Please use 'Asynchronous_filter' after 2025-06-01. It is the same as 'Deferred' in previous version.

projectScopes.description: List of project-level tool label definitions.

toolConnectionName.description: The unique tool connection name, e.g., 'Web_Search'.

labelValues.description: Dictionary of label key-value pairs for the account scope.
Dictionary of label key-value pairs for the project scope.

project.description: Project name to which this scope applies.

createdAt.description: Creation time of the custom topic.

failedReason.description: Failed reason if the status is Failed.

lastModifiedAt.description: Last modified time of the custom topic.

sampleBlobUrl.description: Sample blob url for the custom topic.

topicId.description: The unique identifier of the custom topic.

topicName.description: The name of the custom topic.

RegionSetting.description: The call rate limit Cognitive Services account.

customsubdomain.description: Maps the region to the regional custom subdomain.

name.description: Name of the region.

value.description: A value for priority or weighted routing methods.

SafetyProviderConfig.description: Gets or sets the source to which safety providers applies.

source.description: Content source to apply the Content Filters.

Sku.description: The resource model definition representing SKU

capacity.description: If the SKU supports scale out/in then the capacity integer should be included. If scale out/in is not possible for the resource this may be omitted.

family.description: If the service has different generations of hardware, for the same SKU, then that can be captured here.

name.description: The name of the SKU. Ex - P3. It is typically a letter+number code

size.description: The SKU size. When the name field is the combination of tier and some other value, this would be the standalone code.

tier.description: This field is required to be implemented by the Resource Provider if the service has more than one tier, but is not required on a PUT.

TrafficRoutingRule.description: Represents a rule for routing traffic to a specific deployment.

deploymentId.description: The unique identifier of the deployment to which traffic is routed by this rule.

description.description: A user-provided description for this traffic routing rule.

ruleId.description: The identifier of this traffic routing rule.

trafficPercentage.description: Gets or sets the percentage of traffic allocated to this instance.

UserOwnedAmlWorkspace.description: The user owned AML account for Cognitive Services account.

identityClientId.description: Identity Client id of a AML account resource.

resourceId.description: Full resource id of a AML account resource.

UserOwnedStorage.description: The user owned storage for Cognitive Services account.

resourceId.description: Full resource id of a Microsoft.Storage resource.

VersionedAgentReference.description: Type modeling a reference to a version of an agent definition.

agentId.description: Gets the agent's unique identifier within the organization (subscription).

agentName.description: Gets the agent's name (unique within the project/app).

agentVersion.description: Gets the agent's version (unique for each agent lineage).

VirtualNetworkRule.description: A rule governing the accessibility from a specific virtual network.

id.description: Full resource id of a vnet subnet, such as '/subscriptions/subid/resourceGroups/rg1/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/test-vnet/subnets/subnet1'.

ignoreMissingVnetServiceEndpoint.description: Ignore missing vnet service endpoint or not.

state.description: Gets the state of virtual network rule.
